testimonials.name: Abhijeet Vaikar
testimonials.quote: TAQELAH has been instrumental in connecting me with like-minded QA professionals in Singapore. The workshops are top-notch!

testimonials.name: Akshay Maldhure
testimonials.quote: The mobile testing meetup changed how I approach automation. The community here is incredibly supportive and knowledgeable.

testimonials.name: Taqueem Javed
testimonials.quote: Being part of TAQELAH helped me connect with passionate QA professionals, learn the latest testing trends, and gain hands-on exposure through meetups and workshops that truly leveled up my testing journey

testimonials.name: Keng Hun Koh
testimonials.quote: Great talks, great people, and always learning something new. TAQELAH is a must-attend for anyone in QA.

testimonials.name: Premraj Murugaraj
testimonials.quote: TAQELAH helped me build confidence as a tester â€” from learning new tools and AI-driven testing ideas to networking with experts who genuinely inspire continuous growth.

testimonials.name: Praveen MS
testimonials.quote: Joining TAQELAH gave me a supportive space to share knowledge, discover new testing practices, and connect with like-minded QA professionals who motivate me to keep improving.
